title: EU launches antitrust investigation into Meta’s WhatsApp AI access policy
description: Europe (and Italy) is worried about WhatsApp’s AI policy and its effects on competition.
content:
• The European Commission is launching an in-depth investigation into Meta
  • WhatsApp’s AI policy could be hampering AI chatbot competition
  • Meta could face a fine of $16.5 billion… [+2599 chars]
